data.eml:eml: Rumen ciliates in Brazilian sheep (Ovis aries), with new records and redescription of Entodinium contractum (Entodiniomorphida: Ophryoscolecidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cedrola, Franciane, Martinele, Isabel, Dias, Roberto Júnio Pedroso, Fregulia, Priscila, D’Agosto, Marta (2016): Rumen ciliates in Brazilian sheep (Ovis aries), with new records and redescription of Entodinium contractum (Entodiniomorphida: Ophryoscolecidae). Zootaxa 4088 (2): 292-300, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.269200
